{{cpp/memory/scoped_allocator_adaptor/title|deallocate}}
{{cpp/memory/scoped_allocator_adaptor/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|scoped_allocator}}
{{dcl|since=c++11| 
void deallocate( pointer p, size_type n ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

用外层分配器解分配 {{tt|p}} 所引用的存储，通过调用 {{c|std::allocator_traits&lt;OuterAlloc&gt;::deallocate(outer_allocator(), p, n)}}。

===参数===
{{par begin}}
{{par|p|指向先前分配的内存的指针}}
{{par|n|为止分配内存的对象数量}}
{{par end}}

===返回值===
（无）

===参阅===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/allocator/dsc deallocate}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/memory/allocator_traits/dsc deallocate}}
{{dsc end}}
